biography: Bang Sung-hoon, born Bang In-gyu and known professionally as Sung Hoon, is a South Korean actor and model.
aiSummary: Sung-Hoon Kim is a molecular biology specialist with an H-index of 95 at Seoul National University (Member). Has been published in Nature Communications, Cell, Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
